item.title: CVE-2021-42367|2024-09-17T04:29:39.280Z -- variation%20swatches%20for%20woocommerce -- variation%20swatches%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Variation Swatches for WooCommerce WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via several parameters found in the ~/includes/class-menu-page.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 2.1.1. Due to missing authorization checks on the tawcvs_save_settings function, low-level authenticated users such as subscribers can exploit this vulnerability.
